snippet.title: Holdfast: Frontlines WW1 - Released!
snippet.description:
Take your orders and prepare for Holdfast’s most ambitious update yet. 

Frontlines is a total-conversion DLC based in the WW1 released for free as a show of thanks to our beloved community. Play today!

- Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/589290

- Join us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/holdfastgame

- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/holdfastgame

- Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/holdfastgame
